name: SendKeptnEventTask
author: Realdolmen (Bert Van der Heyden)
helpMarkDown: Send cloud-event to Keptn. Use startEvaluation to trigger Keptn to perform the SLI/SLO based validation.

inputs.name: keptnApiEndpoint
inputs.label: Keptn API Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Connection to the Keptn API which is managed as a connectedService in AzureDevOps.

inputs.name: project
inputs.label: Keptn Project
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Keptn project. When not provided it takes the settings from the Prepare Keptn environment task.

inputs.name: service
inputs.label: Keptn Service
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Keptn service. When not provided it takes the settings from the Prepare Keptn environment task.

inputs.name: stage
inputs.label: Keptn Stage
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Keptn stage. When not provided it takes the settings from the Prepare Keptn environment task.

inputs.name: eventType
inputs.label: Type of event
inputs.helpMarkDown: The type of event send to Keptn

inputs.name: start
inputs.label: Start time for the evaluation
inputs.helpMarkDown: Format: {yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:sszzz}. When not provided, defaults to timeframe.

inputs.name: end
inputs.label: End time for the evaluation
inputs.helpMarkDown: Format: {yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:sszzz}. When not provided, current time is used.

inputs.name: timeframe
inputs.label: Timeframe for the evaluation
inputs.helpMarkDown: Format: for example '15m' goes 15 minutes back from now. When not provided, start - end is used. When they are also empty default is 30m. Note that this property is only supported from Keptn 0.7.3 onwards.

inputs.name: deploymentURI
inputs.label: Deployment URI
inputs.helpMarkDown: The public deploymentURI which will be used to execute the tests against

inputs.name: testStrategy
inputs.label: Testing Strategy
inputs.helpMarkDown: The testing stategy which is used to perform the tests

inputs.name: labels
inputs.label: Labels
inputs.helpMarkDown:
You can add a list of key-value pairs (example 'key:value' use semicolon) separated by a new line. You are able to extend or overwrite the default labels this way.
Default labels are:
- buildId: $(Build.BuildNumber)
- definition: $(Release.DefinitionName)
- runby: $(Build.QueuedBy)
- environment : $(Environment.Name)
- pipeline : $(Release.ReleaseWebURL)

inputs.name: keptnContextVar
inputs.label: KeptnContext output variable
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the pipeline variable to store the keptnContext in
